post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Dencot Holdings IT/IS Recruitment
Job Title         :        System Administrator
Job Category         :         Accounting/Auditing,Administrative,Computers/Info Tech
Job description         :        
Requirements

SharePoint Development (SharePoint 2007)(2 years minimum on multiple projects)
Windows Administration(Server 2003 and 2008)(3- 5 years experience)
Windows XP Desktop Support(3-5 Years)
Excellent People skills and Telephone manor as this role will be customer facing
Nice to Have Skills

Accounting or Legal Law firm - (Almost a requirement as I am looking to offload Accounting Package support from the other IT person here)
Work inside an environment with Clustering or High Levels of uptime
Symantec Backup Exec
VM Ware
Exchange Server 2007 or 2010
Although the size of this firm is fairly small the workload and requirements are demanding enough to meet a much larger organization so someone with experience working inside a large organization with high levels of up time is very important.

Skills         :        
Employment type         :        
Full Time
Minimum Salary         :         $70,000.00

Other Information

Degree         :         Unspecified
Experience (years)         :         3
Job Location         :         Toronto-Ontario-Canada
Post Date         :         03/18/2010
post.title: System Administrator -SharePoint
